FuncDef: This command configures a nested policy statement as a match criterion for the route policy entry.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the route policy name (up to 64 characters long) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters). Allowed values are any string up to 255 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
